title: Chiropractor in Wilmington, NC | Shaver Chiropractic Natural Medicine
author: Christina LaTorre
description: At Shaver Chiropractic & Natural Medicine in Wilmington, NC, we are providing the highest quality of natural health care available. Call us at (910) 418-4554.
cleaned_text: At Shaver Chiropractic & Natural Medicine, our friendly and professional team is committed to providing the highest quality of natural health care available. We are passionate about ensuring that you know you are cared for and that you will receive recommendations customized to your individual needs. Whether you are currently suffering from posture issues, back or neck pain, headaches, an injury, chronic health condition, or other forms of stress and tension, we can help you. In fact, many people seek our assistance simply to improve their overall health. This personal care is why people throughout the Wilmington area trust their health to Shaver Chiropractic & Natural Medicine. Does your neck hurt when you use your cellphone? You could have text neck, one of the many conditions chiropractors treat. Tired of living with chronic pain? Find out if chiropractic car can help. Not sure what to do about tendinitis pain? Call your chiropractor! 8:00 am - 6:00 pm 2:00 pm - 6:00 pm 8:00 am - 6:00 pm 8:00 am - 1:00 pm 8:00 am - 6:00 pm Closed Closed 4421 Junction Park Dr, STE 100, STE 100
